title: National Parks of New York Harbor: Permits & Reservations
body: Permits       Commercial Filming and Photography Permits for each unit of the National Parks of New York Harbor may be requested through the following means: Statue of Liberty National Monument and Ellis Island: Permit Office 212-363-3206, Ext. 107  E-mail us. Gateway National Recreation Area: Permit information and forms. Castle Clinton National Monument: Permit Office 212-825-6990 e-mail us Federal Hall National Memorial:  Permit Office 212-825-6990 e-mail us General Grant National Memorial:   Permit Office 212-825-6990 e-mail us Hamilton Grange National Memorial:   Permit Office 212-825-6990 e-mail us St. Paul's Church National Historic Site:   Permit Office 212-825-6990 e-mail us Theodore Roosevelt Birthplace National Historic Site:   Permit Office 212-825-6990 e-mail us African Burial Ground National Monument: Permit Office 212-825-6990 e-mail us
